TEAM ACTIVITIES

BLAST FROM THE PAST

Luau, a Justia Summer Office Celebration

The Luau is one of the most popular celebrations at Justia. As in ancient times, Justia employees gather together to celebrate the Luau with a feast, costume contests, and we have lots of fun. Our colleagues put on festive hula shirts and grass skirts to celebrate the Aloha Spirit in every friendly gathering. Do not hesitate to wear a classic Hawaiian lei in our next Luau. Use your creativity and imagination to make this office party something out of this world.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

General Magic

Available on:
iTunes | Amazon | Vimeo
Watch the trailer

"A spinoff company from Apple, full of bright minds that were poised to change the personal communications world before the rest of us were ready or even born! Their story is as fascinating as it's entertaining, an intimate view into the inner workings of innovation and the pitfalls of getting carried away with one's own vision without a proper focus on shipping a viable product."

- Angel Ponce

Collaborators: Miguel Berlanga, Donovan Coronado, Haydee Garcia, Alejandra Medina, Lauren Moskie, Rene Peralta & Jose Ramos
